title: Creepy
alt: And I even got out my adorable new netbook!
transcript:
[Two people are sitting on chairs.]
Cueball: Hey, cute netbook.
Megan: What.Cueball: Your laptop. I justâ€”
Megan: No, why are you talking to me.Megan: Who do you think you are? If I were even slightly interested, I'd have shown it.Megan: Hey everyone, this dude's hitting on me.
Voice #1: Haha
Voice #2: Creepy
Voice #3: Let's get his picture for Facebook to warn others.[This panel fades into a thought bubble of Cueball.]
[Megan is typing on her laptop.]
Dear blog,
Cute boy on train still ignoring me.
